author: djrtwo
content:
Due to conflicts with Ethereal this week, we'll push the eth2 meeting to the following Thursday.
We _will_ have a network call on Wednesday. This will be to discuss the range of topics that have come up in the past month. Some minor changes to protocol as well as some open questions/observations

content: We are thinking about having the next stateless call be on next Tuesday. Any conflicts there?

author: djrtwo
content: no eth2 conflicts that I can see
